      public String fightMenu()
      this method display a menu for the user to choose to fight or flee
      Returns:
      the choice of the user

    • displayLootMenu

      public String displayLootMenu(Equipment equipment)
      the purpose of this method is to display a menu so the user can choose to equip or not the equipment found on the LootCase. It takes an object equipment as parameter and returns the choice of the user
      Parameters:
      equipment - farmed on the case
      Returns:
      string representing the user choice to equip or not the equipment found on the case
